## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | 设置是否禁止      | `boolean` | `false` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | 提示文字        | `string`  | `""`    |
| `rows`        | `rows`        | 提示文字        | `number`  | `1`     |
